author: marino
msg: Added three new methods - two to import named attributes from the current tiles definition to either the current velocity context, or a named context ("page", "request", "session", or "application") - and one method to add all attributes of the current tiles definition to a named context ("page", "request", "session", or "application").

author: marino
msg: converted these two to .vm (still need to update the content in both of the .vm files though)

author: marino
msg: each app's resources are now in a seperate file in the corresponding package.  these two are no longer needed.

author: marino
msg: resource files for each example app are now part of each app's package

author: marino
msg: Removed in favour of the standard Struts ForwardAction (ContinueAction didn't do anything but forward)
